item.title: Raichur district receives excess rainfall
item.description:
<![CDATA[Raichur district has received excess rainfall from January till date this year. The district has been receiving continuous rainfall for the last couple of days.
The district has received 6.8 mm rainfall in the last 24 hours.
The highest rainfall of 13.7 mm has been recorded in Deodurg taluk while the lowest of 3.4 mm has been recorded in Raichur taluk.
Maski has received 8.7 mm fainfall, Sirwar 7.1 mm, Lingsugur 5.1 mm, Sindhanur 4.8 mm and Manvi 4.8 mm.
The overall rainfall from January to ...]]>
item.author: Authors

item.title: 5.50 lakh hectares kharif sowing target set for Raichur district
item.description:
<![CDATA[The Agriculture Department has set 5.50 lakh hectares sowing target in Raichur district for the 2025-26 kharif season.
According to sources, of the 5.50 lakh hectares area to be covered, paddy is expected to be planted in approximately 2 lakh hectares, followed by red gram which will be sown in 1.20 lakh hectares, cotton in 1.80 lakh hectares, sunflower in 6,000 hectares and bajra and other crops in around 40,000 hectares.
The district has received adequate pre-monsoon rainfall prompting farme...]]>
item.author: Authors
